parameters.name: parameterObject
parameters.description: Sets the padding property. If set to a number, this value will be used for all four edge values.

description: Base class for all layout managers.

padding.description: Additional space to add inside the widgets bounds.

add.description: Callback used internally by widgets to register themselves as managed by this layout.

remove.description: Callback used internally by widgets to de-register themselves as managed by this layout.

render.description: Callback used internally by the framework to process layoutData.
